With popularity apparent, studios wanted in on this zombie gold rush.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the Saved Galaxy at the edge of the universe where there seems to be plenty of dishnow meat for all. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada stopping for fuel, Joe goes to the Palace Petula beauty pageant final. There, he meets Miss Anchorage and love ensues.
